title: (x) Nintendo Family Computer - ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alternates {Stephen}
content:
I've been trying to figure out what font this is for a long time.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030028im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28944.jpg)

 [‹ Kansas City A's logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030028/http:/typophile.com/node/3655 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) John Deere logo - (similar to) Trade Gothic Ext {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030028/http:/typophile.com/node/3669 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toketsu

comments.content:
The 'A' is part of the Alternate font. Published by Scangraphic,   
 [Fontshop Australia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201030028/http:/www.fontshop.com.au/results.php3?search=avant%2Bgarde&sp=2&fsausess=c84122d1dfda3b0e5c2eaaef395e1812) is the only reseller that still claims to sell it.   
Though it may be that their website is just out of date. My   
understanding is that licensing contracts with Scangraphic have   
run out.
Thanks, wonder why I never noticed that? Huh, probably because I don't pay much attention.
